texts.name: Omega
texts.biography: Omega served under Sargas and after a while gained his favor with his persistence in battle and mastery of the Attack skill. Although at first the Manowar did not very much like the ambitious siren, but in the end was convinced of her reliability and devotion, so he recommended her to Raven, who was looking for commanders for his mission on the continent.

specialty.name: Offence
specialty.description: Receives a 5% per level bonus to offence skill percentage.
